III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS

IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
The facility was not offered technical assistance.
V. CONSULTATION
The facility was not offered consultation.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this
licensing period.
The facility has submitted one acceptable corrective action plans during
this licensing period.
The Interim dated 02/04/2019 was in violation with R400.4156 Updated treatment
plan and R400.4166 1 (e) Discharge plan. The facility submitted an acceptable
corrective action plan on 02/06/2019 for the rule violations. There were no repeat
violations for this renewal period and the facility has stayed on track with their
corrective action plan.
4

VII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes and rules and/or MISEP requirements and/or contract and policy. It is
recommended that Macomb County Juvenile Justice Center be issued a renewal of
their regular license.
